name: Militia Strike
description:
Militia Strike is a singleplayer 2D Fps Style Game It started out as an experiment with AI, and will remain a slightly experimental, for-fun game project.

Controls
  • WASD for moving
  • Space for jump
  • Left Mouse Button(LMB) for shoot
How to play

The objective of the game is to beat your enemy team's score . Do this by killing enemies

Installation

Open your Militia Strike.zip file and drag the Militia Strike folder to somewhere on your computer. Now open your new Militia Strike folder and start the game.

For people getting the "There should be 'Militia Strike_Data' folder next to the executable" error on windows: Make sure you extract the game by dragging the Militia Strike folder from the Militia Strike.zip file to somewhere on your computer. Now open your NEW Militia Strike folder and start the .exe file.
